analysis.summary: Vue single-file component that renders a simple 401 Unauthorized message.
analysis.purpose: Provides a dedicated error page for HTTP 401 Unauthorized responses in the application.

components.name: Unauthorized401Page
components.responsibility: Displays the static “401 Unauthorized” message to the user.

analysis.usage: Typically imported and registered in the application’s router or error‐handling layout by the martyrs framework to display when a 401 error occurs.
analysis.notes: No <script> or <style> sections are present, so the component has no reactive data, props, methods, or custom styling. The root <div> has an empty class attribute that could be cleaned up or extended.
